name: SUPER DUPER ISLAND ADVENTURE
description: If you are looking for a ton of game mechanics, you've come to the wrong place. This is a simple, but difficult game. What are the rules? Well, just get to the end of the game. You might try to collect all the coins to get another ending - or get all the wooden splinters floating around the level. But that's it. Don't go looking for any other endings - and don't EVER touch the palm trees. I've warned you.
